title: Cover Her Face
description: St Cedd’s church féte had been held in the grounds of Martingale for generations.As if organizing stalls and presiding over luncheon, the bishop and the tea-tent were not enough for Mrs Maxie, later that mellow July afternoon her son Stephen sprang the news of his engagement. By morning, Sally Jupp, her new parlourmaid — unmarried mother and minor village scandal — was dead.Investigating murder at the Elizabethan manor house, Detective Chief-Inspector Adam Dalgliesh is intrigued to find more than one fiancée among the suspects — such are the complicated passions beneath the calm surface of English village life...
author: P.D. James
